tree.name: Trey Murphy III
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: NOP sends Adams, Bledsoe, picks to MEM; Iwundu, pick to CHA; receives Murphy, Valanciunas from MEM, Graham from CHA
tree.note: Virginia forward drafted 17th by Memphis, traded to New Orleans

assetsGivenUp.name: Steven Adams
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 4-team Jrue Holiday trade: NOP acquires Adams from OKC
assetsGivenUp.note: Center acquired from Oklahoma City in Jrue Holiday trade expansion

assetsGivenUp.name: Darius Miller

assetsGivenUp.name: Eric Bledsoe
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 4-team Jrue Holiday trade: NOP acquires Bledsoe + picks from MIL
assetsGivenUp.note: Guard acquired from Milwaukee Bucks in Jrue Holiday trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Jrue Holiday
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NOP traded Nerlens Noel (#6 pick) and 2014 1st (Elfrid Payton) to PHI for Jrue Holiday and Pierre Jackson
assetsGivenUp.note: All-Star guard, acquired from Philadelphia. Spent 7 seasons with NOP before traded to MIL.
